data.actual_result: There isn't any padding and it looks weird
data.expected_result: There is padding like there was before
data.short_description: Bottom control bar in a server screenshare has no padding (Appears to be windows specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a screenshare in a guild - Click on the channel so you're viewing the screenshare - Resize your window vertically so the black bars appear - Look at the bottom controls
